attributes.action: ...I have read the Prime Minister's e mail and I still want him to scrap road charging/pricing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have read the e mail that the Prime Minister has sent to those who signed the original petition regarding road charging and considered his arguments. However, I remain unconvinced and want him to scrap any plans for these charges.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
